APITestDescription.Description: The test is against the toString1010 method. It performs the following checks on values returned by the method. 1) The method applied two times to the same returns the same String value both times. 2) The method applied to two threads having the same names and priorities and belonging to the same thread group returns the same String values. 3) The method applied to two threads having the same names but different priorities and belonging to the same thread group returns different String values. 4) The method applied to two threads having the same names but belonging to different thread groups returns different String values. 5) The method applied to two threads having different names and belonging to different thread groups returns different String values.
